REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0901 reute r f BC-SPAIN-HAS-68-MLN-DLR 03-12 0058

TEXT.TITLE: SPAIN HAS 68 MLN DLR JANUARY PAYMENTS SURPLUS
TEXT.BODY: Spain had a 68 mln dlr current account balance of payments surplus in January compared with a 556 mln deficit in December and 370 mln surplus in January last year, Bank of Spain figures show. The trade deficit rose to 664 mln dlrs in January from 146 mln in January 1986. REUTER
